member.summary: Event arguments for buffer processing event.

member.summary: The time the buffer was processed.

member.summary: The number of buffers read so far.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwBufferProcessedEventArgs.BufferSize
member.summary: The overall size of the buffer.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwBufferProcessedEventArgs.BufferUsed
member.summary: The number of bytes used in the buffer.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwBufferProcessedEventArgs.Context
member.summary: The context provided when the trace was opened.

member.summary: Creates event arguments for the buffer processed event.

The number of buffers read so far.
The overall size of the buffer.
The number of bytes used in the buffer.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwClockResolution
member.summary: The clock resolution used during tracing.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwClockResolution.QueryPerformanceCounter
member.summary: Query performance counter (QPC). The QPC counter provides a high-resolution time stamp that is not affected by adjustments to the system clock.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwClockResolution.SystemTime
member.summary: System time. The system time provides a time stamp that tracks changes to the systemâ€™s clock.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwClockResolution.CpuCycleCounter
member.summary: CPU cycle counter. The CPU counter provides the highest resolution time stamp and is the least resource-intensive to retrieve. However, the CPU counter is unreliable and should not be used in production.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwEvent.ProcessId
member.summary: The process the event was recorded in.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwEvent.ThreadId
member.summary: The thread the event was recorded on.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwEvent.Level
member.summary: The trace level of the event.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwEvent.ProcessorNumber
member.summary: The processor number the event was recorded on.

member.summary: Gets the instance information for the event, if any.

member.summary: The name of the task, if any.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode
member.summary: Flags for how events are logged.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.Sequential
member.summary: Writes events to a log file sequentially; stops when the file reaches its maximum size.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.Circular
member.summary: Writes events to a log file. After the file reaches the maximum size, the oldest events are replaced with incoming events.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.Append
member.summary: Appends events to an existing sequential log file. If the file does not exist, it is created.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.NewFile
member.summary: Automatically switches to a new log file when the file reaches the maximum size.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.PreAllocate
member.summary: Reserves the maximum file size of disk space for the log file in advance.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.NonStoppable
member.summary: The logging session cannot be stopped.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.Secure
member.summary: Restricts who can log events to the session.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.RealTime
member.summary: Delivers the events to consumers in real-time. Events are delivered when the buffers are flushed, not at the time the provider writes the event.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.DelayOpenFile
member.summary: Delay opening the log file until an event occurs.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.Buffering
member.summary: This mode writes events to a circular memory buffer. Events written beyond the total size of the buffer evict the oldest events still remaining in the buffer.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.PrivateLogger
member.summary: Creates a user-mode event tracing session that runs in the same process as its event trace provider.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.AddHeader
member.summary: Adds a header to the log file.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.UseKbytesForSize
member.summary: Use kilobytes as the unit of measure for specifying the size of a file. The default unit of measure is megabytes.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.UseGlobalSequence
member.summary: Uses sequence numbers that are unique across event tracing sessions.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.UseLocalSequence
member.summary: Uses sequence numbers that are unique only for an individual event tracing session.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.PrivateInProc
member.summary: Enforces that only the process that registered the provider GUID can start the logger session with that GUID.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.IndependentSession
member.summary: A logging session should not be affected by EventWrite failures in other sessions.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.NoPerProcessorBuffering
member.summary: Writes events that were logged on different processors to a common buffer.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwLogFileMode.AddToTriageDump
member.summary: Adds ETW buffers to triage dumps.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwPropertyDescriptor
member.summary: Description of an ETW event's property.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwProvider.Name
member.summary: The name of the provider (may be null).

member.summary: Creates a provider with a specified name and ID.

member.summary: Gets the provider that corresponds to an EventSource.
member.param: The name of the event source.

member.summary: Returns information about instance of the provider.

member.name: M:EtwTools.EtwProvider.GetPublishedProviders
member.summary: Returns a list of all published providers on the system.
member.returns: The published providers on the system.

member.name: M:EtwTools.EtwProvider.GetRegisteredProviders
member.summary: Returns a list of all providers registered on the system.
member.returns: The registered providers on the system.

member.name: M:EtwTools.EtwProvider.GetEventDescriptors
member.summary: Gets descriptions of events supported by this provider.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwProvider.InstanceInfo
member.summary: Information about an instance of this provider.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwProvider.InstanceInfo.ProcessId
member.summary: The process ID of the instance.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwProvider.InstanceInfo.EnableInfos
member.summary: Information about each way the provider was enabled.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwProvider.EnableInfo
member.summary: Information about an instance of a provider being enabled.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwProvider.EnableInfo.MatchAnyKeyword
member.summary: Bitmask of keywords that determine the category of events the provider should write.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwProvider.EnableInfo.MatchAllKeyword
member.summary: Restricts the category of events that the provider should write.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.ClockResolution
member.summary: The clock resolution used by the session.

member.name: M:EtwTools.EtwSession.GetAllSessions
member.summary: Gets all ETW sessions the user has access to.

member.name: M:EtwTools.EtwSession.GetSession(System.String)
member.summary: Finds the session with the given name.
member.returns: The session, if found, null otherwise.

member.name: M:EtwTools.EtwSession.CreateSession(System.String,EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties)
member.summary: Creates a new ETW session and returns an object that represents the session.
member.param: The properties of the new session.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.BufferSize
member.summary: Amount of memory allocated for each event tracing session buffer, in kilobytes.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.MinimumBuffers
member.summary: Minimum number of buffers allocated for the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.MaximumBuffers
member.summary: Maximum number of buffers allocated for the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.MaximumFileSize
member.summary: Maximum size of the file used to log events, in megabytes.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.LogFileMode
member.summary: Logging modes for the event tracing session.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.FlushTimer
member.summary: How often, in seconds, the trace buffers are forcibly flushed.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.SystemTraceProvidersEnabled
member.summary: Which kernel events should be included in the trace.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Properties.LogFileName
member.summary: The name of the log file.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Statistics.NumberOfBuffers
member.summary: The number of buffers allocated for the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Statistics.FreeBuffers
member.summary: The number of buffers that are allocated but unused in the event tracing session's buffer pool.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Statistics.EventsLost
member.summary: The number of events that were not recorded.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Statistics.LogBuffersLost
member.summary: The number of buffers that could not be written to the log file.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwSession.Statistics.RealTimeBuffersLost
member.summary: The number of buffers that could not be delivered in real-time to the consumer.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwSystemTraceProvider.NoSysConfig
member.summary: Do not do system configuration rundown.

member.summary: Constructs a trace from a log file.
member.param: The path of the log file.

member.param: A callback when buffers are processed.
A callback when events are processed.

member.summary: The version of the OS the trace was captured on.

member.summary: The processor count on the machine.

member.summary: Time when the machine was booted.

member.summary: End time of the trace, if any.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwTrace.Statistics.MaximumFileSize
member.summary: Maximum size of the log file.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwTrace.Statistics.BufferSize
member.summary: The size of the trace's buffers;

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwTrace.Statistics.TimerResolution
member.summary: The timer resolution of the hardware timer, in 100 nanoseconds.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwTrace.Statistics.PerfFrequency
member.summary: The frequency of the high-performance counter, if any.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwTrace.Statistics.IsKernelTrace
member.summary: Whether the trace is from the NT Kernel Logger.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwTrace.BufferStatistics
member.summary: Statistics about a buffer that was processed.

member.name: P:EtwTools.EtwTrace.BufferStatistics.ProcessedTime
member.summary: The time the buffer was processed.

member.summary: The number of buffers read so far.

member.summary: The overall size of the buffer.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwTraceInstanceProperties
member.summary: Properties of an instance of a trace provider.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceInstanceProperties.Legacy
member.summary: This provider was registered using RegisterTraceGuids instead of EventRegister.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceInstanceProperties.PreEnabled
member.summary: This provider was enabled without being registered.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwTraceLevel
member.summary: The level of detail provided by an event provider.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceLevel.Warning
member.summary: Warning events such as allocation failures.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceLevel.Information
member.summary: Non-error events such as entry or exit events.

member.name: T:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties
member.summary: Additional properties that can be enabled for a provider.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.SecurityIdentifier
member.summary: Include in the extended data the security identifier (SID) of the user.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.TerminalSessionIdentifier
member.summary: Include in the extended data the terminal session identifier.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.StackTrace
member.summary: Include in the extended data a call stack trace for events written using EventWrite.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.IgnoreKeyword0
member.summary: Filters out all events that do not have a non-zero keyword specified.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.ProviderGroup
member.summary: Indicates that this should enable a Provider Group rather than an individual Event Provider.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.ProcessStartKey
member.summary: Include the Process Start Key in the extended data.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.EventKey
member.summary: Include the Event Key in the extended data.

member.name: F:EtwTools.EtwTraceProperties.ExcludeInPrivate
member.summary: Filters out all events that are either marked as an InPrivate event or come from a process that is marked as InPrivate.
